task.title: Using the Seed Maker
task.shortdesc: If you have played through a few seasons in the game you will gain access to the seed maker. This machine will allow you to create seeds from existing crops at no extra cost.

taskbody.prereq: You must already have at least one fully grown version of your desired crop to turn into seeds.

step.cmd: Equip one or more of the crop you wish to turn into seeds.

step.note: Caution: If you have a stack of crops equipped all of them will be converted into seeds.
step.cmd: Right click to place them in the seed maker.

step.note: After a few moments a pop up will appear over the seed maker with an image of the crop seeds you just crafted. This means that all the seeds are ready to be collected.
